message: Working fast food is stressful amd degrading and people know they cant stand for 10-12 hrs straight when they are fifty lmao. I never wanted to work fast food because its embarrassing and I wanted a career and to do something useful with my time. Doesn't mean those that do should get paid less than a true living wage.
Wow could you imagine knowing that you'd be that old and being 55 and you only lived half your life.

The taps were not ilegal. They were all approved by the justice, the process was running in secret to avoid interference, but once Lula was nominated minister, government manoeuvre to avoid his prosecution, The judge, through legal means, declared the process as public And legally exposed all evidence. If you were a lawyer, a good one, if you had studied law in Brazil you would know that! I remind you Latin countries legal system follow the Romam law, different from what happens in UK and US. And you are also wrong about Brazilians, all we want is all corrupted people to pay for their crimes.
